lead_paragraph: President Obama has chosen Mr. Rosenberg, a senior F.B.I. official and former United States attorney, to replace Michele M. Leonhart.

headline.print_headline: National Briefing | Washington; Interim Chief Is Chosen for the D.E.A.
headline.main: Obama Is Said to Choose Chuck Rosenberg as Next D.E.A. Director

snippet: President Obama has chosen Mr. Rosenberg, a senior F.B.I. official and former United States attorney, to replace Michele M. Leonhart.
abstract: Pres Obama appoints Chuck Rosenberg, senior Federal Bureau of Investigation official and former United States attorney, as interim director of Drug Enforcement Administration; Rosenberg will replace Michele M Leonhart, who resigned amid scandal in April.
